name: Magic Missile
description: An unerring dart of magical force strikes the target.

name: Flaming Sphere
description: Sphere deals damage to enemies that start their turn nearby.

name: Lance of Faith
effect: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target.
